create.tips.item5: Respond promptly to offers and questions

agreement.title: Application Agreement
agreement.term1: The Applicant agrees to perform the task for the posted amount.
agreement.term2: The Applicant is not obligated to perform the task if material circumstances arise that were not reasonably known at the time of applying (e.g., substantially different scope, unsafe conditions, or missing information).
agreement.term3: This agreement is not an employment contract and does not create an employer-employee relationship.
agreement.term4: Messaging within the platform should be used to clarify scope and logistics.
agreement.term5: Either party may cancel before work begins if a mutual understanding cannot be reached.
agreement.mustAgree: You must agree to the terms before proceeding
